app.title: Ask Sarkar
app.subtitle: File your RTI application in minutes
app.tagline: Empowering citizens with the Right to Information

form.identityHelp: You are not required to provide personal details beyond contact information
form.queryPlaceholder: Please provide specific details of the information you are seeking...
form.template1: Provide certified copies of all documents related to
form.template2: Give details of expenditure incurred on
form.template3: Share names and designations of officers responsible for
form.template4: Provide information regarding the status of
form.deliveryMethod: How would you like to receive the information?
form.agreeToPayFee: Do you agree to pay the required fee?
form.feeNote: RTI application fee is â‚¹10. Payment can be made via Indian Postal Order, Demand Draft, or cash (where applicable).
form.depositedFee: Have you deposited the application fee?
form.belongToBPL: Do you belong to Below Poverty Line category?
form.bplProofProvided: Have you furnished proof of BPL status?
form.bplNote: No fee is charged from persons below poverty line
form.previouslyProvided: Has this information been provided earlier?
form.notMadeAvailable: Was this information not made available by the public authority?

validation.dateRange: End date must be after start date

chat.welcome: Hi! I can help you file an RTI application. What issue are you facing with government services? Just tell me in simple words - whether it's about roads, water supply, pending documents, or any other problem.
chat.title: RTI Assistant
chat.subtitle: Your guide to government transparency
chat.placeholder: Type your complaint or query here...
chat.error: Sorry, I couldn't process that. Please try again.
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I couldn't process that. Please try again.
chat.noMessages: Start a conversation to get help with your RTI
chat.readyMessage: Click below to fill the complete form with this RTI query.
chat.readyToGenerate: Your RTI application is ready to be generated.

name: Full Name
chatDescription: Tell me about your issue in simple words, and I'll help you draft a proper RTI application.
